alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:01AM CDT until July 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR LIPSCOMB...SOUTHEASTERN HANSFORD AND SOUTHERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 101 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Higgins to 11 miles south of Spearman, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Spearman, Lipscomb, Higgins and Wolf Creek Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
